single_crochet rope 7 slip_stitch rope 8 slip_stitch rope and bracelet 2 charts and ideas slip_stitch charts design # 8 design # 7 design # 2 design # 3 all my charts are strung left to right for left handers and right to left for right handers i also string from the top of the chart down important things to remember remember to check that there is only one stitch in each stitch remember when you roll the bead over the top of the hook there should only be one thread on the hook remember that your work is going to spiral as you work nature of the beast 3 remember that if your are right handed you will be working counter clockwise and if you are left handed you will be working clockwise this is important when doing a pattern especially if it is an offset pattern you must string your beads in the proper order or your pattern wont work out right all my patterns string right to left for a left hander and left to right for a right hander i also sting from top to bottom of the chart if uncertain do a test piece of about four patterns i certainly do not want to string several hundred beads on a thread only to find out i have them strung backwards slip_stitch rope 1 does not need a chart it is very simple to string string * 4 beads of color number 1 and 4 beads of color number 2 * repeat from * to * as many times as desired using two different size beads can give an interesting effect single_crochet slides charts design 6 slide design 4 slide design 5 slide 4 to make the slide you will crochet a strip according to the chart work from top to bottom of chart there are no beads where there are no symbols this gives you room for the sew on rhinestone i strung the rhinestone on with my beads and when i was finished i sewed it down again with sewing thread sew up sides short side to short side right sides facing turn right side out and slide onto rope should be snug general crochet instructions once the beads have been strung chain a chain of one stitch more than the number of beads of the first row a row of 55 beads you would chain 56 turn skip first chain and work a single_crochet in each chain to end chain 1 turn there are no beads worked onto this first row it gives you the bottom edge to attach you fringe to when you put your purse together now you will begin working the beads in as you go begin a single_crochet stitch when you have the loop caught
